avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs can be expected in mountains due to snowfall and snowdrift from variable winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has added and drifted in recent days. Before that, there was relatively little snow, with old stiff and stable snow in mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Spáð er kólnandi veðri, rólegt og lítil él. Hiti um og yfir frostmarki á láglendi.

avalancheActivity.comment: Several sluffs and small avalanches fell around Ísafjörður on Tuesday 4 March and on Kleifaheiði on Monday 3. March.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs can be expected in mountains due to snowfall and snowdrift from variable winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has added and drifted in recent days. Before that, there was relatively little snow, with old stiff and stable snow in mountains. Wind slabs are expected to continue to build up in the mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Spáð er kólnandi veðri, rólegt og úrkomulítið.

avalancheActivity.comment: An avalanche released in Krossafjall on March 4th.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Some new snow is in the area and wind slabs could be present at high elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It has snowed a bit in the area during variable winds, and snow has accumulated in gullies and lows. Wind slab formation is expected at high elevations. Older snow is considered stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hægviðri á fimmtudag og líkur á dálítilli snjókomu. Á föstudag snýst í norðaustlæga átt með dálítilli snjókomu. Hiti breytist lítið en kólnar á laugardag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluff released in Magnúsartindur in Oddsskarð on Feb 26th.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Little snow is at low elevations and mostly hard packed snow in the mountains. Small slabs could be present at high elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little snow is at low elevations and hard packed snow in the mountains. Small slabs could be present at high elevations mountains. It snowed a bit the night before Tuesday but the sun has mostly melted the new snow. Some blowing snow was at high elevations on Tuesday. Chances of some snowfall on Friday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Skýjað með köflum næstu daga og úrkomulítið. Líkur á dálítilli snjókomu á föstudag. Hiti um og yfir frostmarki á láglendi.
